item.title: Full Privacy Real Simple The Tools of the Modern Ghost
item.description: Complete practical and understandable. This is the modern privacy guide for people who want to take control of their digital life using open verifiable tools.

item.title: I Am Kirksville’s Linux Guy
item.description:
I Am Kirksville’s Linux Guy

If your computer’s slowing down, freezing, or begging for upgrades, it might not be your hardware’s fault — it’s the software.
I help people around Kirksville keep their technology useful with Linux, the open-source operating system that quietly runs most of the world’s technology.
This isn’t a sales pitch; it’s just what I do here in town.

“If your computer’s groaning like a tractor in February, I can tune it up.”

item.title: Why You Should Use ProtonMail in Kirksville: The Email That Doesnt Spy on You
item.description: Google reads your emails like a nosy neighbor. ProtonMail locks them up tighter than Fort Knox. Heres why that matters in Kirksville.
